readme:
# ComfyUI on RunPod

This template provides ComfyUI with CUDA 12.1 support, optimized for RunPod deployment.

## Features
- ComfyUI with latest updates
- CUDA 12.1 with PyTorch 2.2.0
- Pre-installed ComfyUI Manager
- Popular custom nodes pre-installed
- Persistent storage support
- Web UI accessible on port 8188

## Quick Start
1. Deploy this template on RunPod
2. Wait for initialization (1-2 minutes)
3. Access ComfyUI at your pod URL on port 8188
4. Use ComfyUI Manager to install additional models and nodes

## Storage
- Models: /workspace/ComfyUI/models
- Outputs: /workspace/ComfyUI/output
- Inputs: /workspace/ComfyUI/input

## Environment Variables
- DOWNLOAD_MODELS: Download base models on startup
- AUTO_UPDATE: Auto-update ComfyUI
- COMFYUI_ARGS: Additional ComfyUI arguments

## Support
For issues or questions, visit: https://github.com/effekt/runpod
